Package com.deco2800.game.rendering

Class DayNightCycleComponent

java.lang.Object
com.deco2800.game.components.Component
com.deco2800.game.input.InputComponent
com.deco2800.game.rendering.DayNightCycleComponent
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.badlogic.gdx.input.GestureDetector.GestureListener, com.badlogic.gdx.InputProcessor
public class DayNightCycleComponent extends InputComponent
This class is responsible for shading the game screen when invoked in RendererService
